short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduce your cloud computing costs and carbon footprint!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EcoCloud allows users to get query cost estimate directly in BigQuery to easily spot expensive queries.
We plan to release new features shortly, including:
- Query optimization recommandations
- Automatic query improvements

(Currently supporting english, french and spanish as BigQuery language)

To know more about the product or if you have any feedback you can write me an e-mail (abdellah@teker.ai).
